data.title: Configuration Changes

before.code:
spec:
  replicas: 2
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: api
        image: api-server:v1.0.0
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

after.code:
spec:
  replicas: 3
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: api
        image: api-server:v1.1.0
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

insights: Replicas increased from 2 to 3 for better load handling
Image updated from v1.0.0 to v1.1.0
Resource limits doubled to accommodate new features
